page.title: 01The Golspie area.
page.content: This area is dominated by the village of Golspie which is one of the principal east-coast villages of Sutherland and contains the district council offices. The area is dominated by the mountain,Ben Bhraggie(Bein a' Bhragaidh) which is topped by a huge statue of the 1st Duke of Sutherland. Golspie has a wide shopping range,a high school serving the whole of Sutherland,a camping site,various hotels and bed and breakfast establishments, sandy beaches,a good golf course,an indoor swimming pool and various other sporting facilities. The area has many good walks including the path up Ben Bhraggie and a spectacular stroll through the Big Burn gorge spanned by many wooden bridges.
